entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
